text: 4:3 Jenesis 9:3; Rom 14:6; 1 Korin 8:8; 10:30-31; Kolosi 2:20-21; Hibru 13:4Me gumaziba amuiba ikian men anogoroke. Egha dagher God e bagha ingarizir maba, me ghaze ia dar aman markɨ. Dagher kaba, God ghaze, gumazamizir guizɨn akam gɨfogha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itiba, merara dagher kaba iniam. Me dagheba iniva dar amɨva God mɨnabagh.
